SEARCH
Package pt.uc.dei.utils

Class PdfGenerator

java.lang.Object
pt.uc.dei.utils.PdfGenerator
public class PdfGenerator extends Object
Utility class for generating PDF reports for employee appraisals using Apache PDFBox.

This class provides a method to export a list of AppraisalResponseDTO objects to a PDF file, with support for language-specific headers, custom fonts, color schemes, and multi-page layouts.

The generated PDF includes:

  • Header with logo and report date
  • Summary section with total and average scores
  • Table of appraisals with feedback and manager info
  • Custom fonts and color styling
  • Automatic page breaks and footers
Note: Uses Apache PDFBox for PDF generation. Throws a RuntimeException on failure.

    • generateAppraisalsPdf

      public static void generateAppraisalsPdf(List<AppraisalResponseDTO> appraisals, OutputStream outputStream, Language lang) throws IOException
      Generates a PDF report from a list of AppraisalResponseDTO objects.

      The output includes a header, summary, table of appraisals, and feedback, with support for Portuguese and English. Custom fonts and colors are applied for improved readability and branding.

      Parameters:
      appraisals - the list of AppraisalResponseDTO objects to export
      outputStream - the OutputStream to write the PDF to
      lang - the Language for translation
      Throws:
      IOException - if PDF generation fails
